    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Properties> getConfigProperties()
      Gets the config properties, based on a set of conventions:
      -The properties file name has to finish in ".configuration.properties"
      -The properties file has to be placed in classpath of the application By convention, the name of property file has to begin by the first piece of the name of configuration class.
      <CONFIG_CLASS extends com.mobiground.ecap.configuration.Configuration> 
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Properties>      		 getConfigProperties(java.lang.Class<CONFIG_CLASS> configurationClass)
      Gets the config properties for the given configuration class following the pattern of PropertyResolver.getConfigProperties() method.

    • Method Detail

      • getConfigProperties

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Properties> getConfigProperties()
        Description copied from interface: PropertyResolver
        Gets the config properties, based on a set of conventions:
        -The properties file name has to finish in ".configuration.properties"
        -The properties file has to be placed in classpath of the application By convention, the name of property file has to begin by the first piece of the name of configuration class. Example: Given this class name:
        ExampleConfiguration.java
        The configuration properties file will be:
        Example.configuration.properties
        Specified by:
        getConfigProperties in interface PropertyResolver
        Returns:
        the config properties

      • getConfigProperties

        public <CONFIG_CLASS extends com.mobiground.ecap.configuration.Configuration> java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Properties> getConfigProperties(java.lang.Class<CONFIG_CLASS> configurationClass)
        Description copied from interface: PropertyResolver
        Gets the config properties for the given configuration class following the pattern of PropertyResolver.getConfigProperties() method.
        Specified by:
        getConfigProperties in interface PropertyResolver
        Type Parameters:
        CONFIG_CLASS - the generic type
        Parameters:
        configurationClass - the configuration class
        Returns:
        the config properties
